title: Is there anyone familiar with manual set up of QoS? (Zyxel C1100Z)
body: I noticed on the lag report that for my ISP the average ping is about 20-30 less than what I get (it reports most people get in the 80s while I sit at around 105-115), I was going to set up QoS but I have no idea what half of these rules do as I am unfamiliar with QoS, is anyone familiar with setting it up on this modem or knows what rules to use for League?

replies.body:
That's just a biiiiiiit over this poro's head sadly. If you want to get that setup properly I'd suggest contacting the modem manufacturer or the manual that came with it for the basics. 

If you're just trying whatever you can to get a better connection/ping to our servers, I can guide you through a couple easier steps really quickly. Try updating your Port Forwarding and DNS router settings by following those steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Hit me back up and let me know if that helps!

I'm mainly just aiming for a bit lower ping but the biggest aspect I'm aiming for is to get what QoS provides, reliable bandwidth for League at all times, my roommates are constantly streaming netflix, so to have League take priority so my ping doesn't skyrocket and fluctuate in the 800 range for 3 hours when they get back sounds incredible, unfortunately I know next to nothing about this.

Ahhhh okay I see where you're going with this now. I'm a little familiar with those settings, but honestly I don't know enough myself to guide you through that in the best way. Hit up our tech team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) though and they should be able to get you going!
What category should I put this under? it doesn't seem like there's anything that says 'Please save me from my room mates streaming 4k netflix' or 'Technical support'
